description: This table stores the action audit performed on the discrete data.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the reference identifier associated with the discrete data.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of action performed on the discrete data.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ACT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the user performing the action on discrete data.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ACT_INST
columns.description: This item stores the instant of the audit action on the discrete data.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ASSC_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the associated contact where the discrete data resides.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_LPL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the Problem List record if the discrete data was filed into the Problem List.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ORD_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the Orders record if the discrete data was filed into an Order record.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ACT_DESC
columns.description: This item stores additional description about the action being taken.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_DATA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the data type associated with the audit action.


May contain organization-specific values: No

columns.name: ACT_AUD_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the Procedure record if the discrete data was filed into surgical history.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ERX_ID
columns.description: Contains the networked medication record ID that was reconciled via NoteReader.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_DC_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the discontinue reason for the discontinue action made on an external medication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_AUD_DC_RSN_FT
columns.description: This item stores the free-text discontinue reason for the discontinue action made on an external medication.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_LOC_UPD_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of action performed on local data using external data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Added as Inactive (Primary)


Added as Inactive (Secondary)


Local Updated With Active

Local Made Inactive (Secondary)

columns.name: ACT_AUD_INF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the Infections record if the discrete data was filed into an Infections record.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_EDG_DX_ID
columns.description: This item stores the allergen ID if the discrete data was filed to diagnoses or medical history.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_ORD_CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the DAT of the ORD record if the discrete data was filed into ORD.

columns.name: ACT_AUD_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the a note which was auto-reconciled from a C-CDA document and was later deleted by the Auto-Reconciled Notes Cleanup Utliity.
